nodes.text: TK-147 was the designation of a stormtrooper who served in a remnant of the Galactic Empire led by Moff Gideon, operating at a base on the volcanic planet Nevarro. Around 9 ABY, TK-147 and another stormtrooper were traversing the corridors of the base, discussing a disturbance with scan control which TK-147 concluded to be a blown transformer. The other stormtrooper decided that they would check it out, and TK-147 contacted Section-Four, suggesting a technical crew should check the issue out. Unbeknownst to the pair, a group of infiltrators including Magistrate Greef Karga, Marshal Cara Dune, Mandalorian Din Djarin, and a Mythrol, passed behind the troopers on their way to sabotage the base.

TK-147 appeared in "Chapter 12: The Siege" of Jon Favreau's 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, directed by Carl Weathers and released on November 20, 2020. The stormtrooper was credited as "Stormtrooper 1" in the subtitles.
